programme.title: Peppa Pig S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Mr Dinosaur is Lost - George's favourite toy is Mr.Dinosaur. One day Mr.Dinosaur gets stuck up a tree and George thinks he is lost, so Peppa helps George find him.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep160
programme.desc: Snow Dream - Bubu has fixed Froga's barometer and everyone is surprised when it says there will be snow today (on a warm summer day!). Everyone is excited, Bubu wants to make to make a five-seater sled! He gets upset, when they realize it was a false forecast!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep161
programme.desc: Backwards Day - Anna and Froga forgot that today is Ron's Day. There's nothing to eat and Christopher is missing! But, in the rush, everything is going wrong. How will they ever manage to throw a great party for Ron?

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S02 Ep204
programme.desc: Blue's Big Baking Show - It's a sweet and delicious day at Blue's Bakery, because Josh and Blue are baking bibingka, a cake from the Philippines! We play Blue's Clues to figure out who Blue wants to bake for, and help the Banana Baker collect bananas for her Monkey Muffins!

programme.title: PAW Patrol S09 Ep926
programme.desc: Charger Visits the Pups / Pups Save a Shiny Ride - Rubble's cousin, Charger, visits Adventure Bay just in time to help out when a Humdinger-caused geyser destroys Mr. Porter's cafe. // Mayor Humdinger hatches a plan to sabotage a "Shinest Ride Contest", so it's up to the Paw Patrol to save the day.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S07 Ep716
programme.desc: Pups Save the Chalk Art - The Mini Patrol and the Pups race to the rescue to save a local mural before the rain comes.

programme.title: Rubble and Crew S01 Ep103
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Ice Cream Shop / The Crew Fixes A Squeak - When a windy day derails construction on an ice cream shop, Rubble, Mix, Wheeler, and Charger are on the chase. // There's a mysterious squeak in City Hall. Mayor Greatway asks Rubble and Charger to find and fix the squeak before her big speech!

programme.title: Deer Squad S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Doctor Steel Little / Astonished And Amazed - Sir Steel unwittingly took over Bobbi's role to communicate with baby animals, with the help of his animal translator. // In his quest to win the Platinum City Flower Show, Sir Steel created super seeds that grow into gigantic mazes.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep211
programme.desc: Paddington's Lucky Day / Paddington the Pizza Chef - Paddington Jonathan & Judy are worried they've used up all of Lucky the dog's luck - how will they tell Sofia? // Baaz's niece Simi is visiting & he wants to create the perfect pizza to surprise her with but it's not easy with hungry animals around!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Potato Stew - Tiny Chef cooks pirate potato stew and uses a treasure map to find the special ingredient

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep72
programme.desc: Teddy Bear - Po finds a teddy bear in Teletubbyland. Tinky Winky, Dipsy, LaaLaa and Po excitedly show the teddy to the Tiddlytubbies and they all love it very much.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S4 Ep17
programme.desc: Lemon - Dee encourages a friend to say 'lemon' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see a yellow lemon, a leafy lemon, a juicy lemon and a sour lemon.

programme.title: Tinpo S1 Ep38
programme.desc: Meow Mountain - Tinpotown's "eye in the sky" helicopter Pilot Po doesn't want to take his eyes of his new pet kitten.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep20
programme.desc: It's Time to Make Ice Lollies - On a hot summer day, JoJo, Gran Gran and their friends are painting the fence around the community garden. JoJo and Gran Gran decide to buy ice lollies from Jared's shop, only to find he has run out!

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep75
programme.desc: Get It Wrong To Get It Right - Monty is sad when he messes up his paper plane creation, but Gran teaches him that a person can learn from their mistakes.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep74
programme.desc: Purple Zappa - Monty gets a new toy robot and wonders whether it is better to keep it shiny and clean in the box or to have fun playing with it.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep11
programme.desc: Charades - Bluey and Bingo want everyone to play charades, but Muffin and Socks are too young to understand the rules and Nana must think quickly to keep the game on track.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep14
programme.desc: The Food Growing Badge - Duggee is sowing seeds. The squirrels want to grow something too, but who will grow what?

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep13
programme.desc: The Omelette Badge - Duggee decides to make an omelette, but there are no eggs so the squirrels turn to the chickens for help.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep12
programme.desc: The Leaf Badge - The Squirrels go for a woodland walk to help Duggee look for a very special leaf.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Sydney Opera House, Australia - Glitch transform's Sydney's iconic Opera House into an opera boat for a race around the Australian city's harbour.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Niagara Falls, Canada and USA - Glitch blocks Niagara Falls to give GrimHQ a mud bath, so the Go Jetters set out to fix the problem.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep10
programme.desc: Rug Island - On Bingo and Bluey's Rug Island, a pack of felt pens can be anything: bananas, campfires, even a snake. But Dad will need to embrace his inner kid if he wants to make it his home.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep9
programme.desc: Bingo - When Bluey has a playdate at Chloe's, Bingo must learn how to play by herself. But all the games she knows need more than one person! Luckily Dad has a problem that needs solving.

programme.title: Andy's Prehistoric Adventures S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Paraceratherium & Footprint - Andy arrives 30 million years ago in Mongolia, where he meets the paraceratherium; a giant mammal five times the size of a rhinoceros.

programme.title: My Pet and Me: Vet Tales S2 Ep22
programme.desc: Missy the dog - Ferne visits Marlee who is taking her pet dog Missy to the vet because she has a lump on her tummy. Rory learns how the vet at a zoo keeps flies from bothering some very special Rhinos.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S5 Ep16
programme.desc: Three Captain Captains - Captain Captain is surprised to find Cook and Line dressed-up like her and shouting orders.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep11
programme.desc: The Bouncing Badge - It's Tag's birthday and Duggee has put up a bouncy castle to celebrate, but will they get a chance to try out some bouncing?

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep9
programme.desc: The Scarecrow Badge - Tag, Betty, Happy and Norrie help Duggee to build an enormous robot scarecrow whilst Roly keeps a careful watch on the birds.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S1 Ep8
programme.desc: The Treasure Hunt Badge - The squirrels find a treasure map inside Duggee's big shiny ruby, but they must pass a sea monster and a giant snake to get to the treasure.

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Sahara Desert, Africa - Glitch makes a sandcastle around an oasis in the Sahara. Can the Go Jetters save the day?

programme.title: Go Jetters S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Stonehenge, England - The Go Jetters set out to stop Glitch playing dominoes with the ancient stones of Stonehenge.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S14 Ep9
programme.desc: Pop Goes Thomas - Thomas has to carry a load of lemonade to a party.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep27
programme.desc: Perimeter Pals - Sarah, Duck & Bug set off on a big adventure, through uncharted territory, as they attempt to cycle all the way around the park.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S3 Ep26
programme.desc: Rainbow Race - The changeable weather means Rainbow has to leave before finishing his story. Sarah & Duck try to find out how the story ends.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Mobile Phones - Nora tries to make a tin can telephone call to Oliver.

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep31
programme.desc: Dog Loves Puzzles - Dog has to solve in own problem. In their adventure, they meet Granny Pug who makes them solve three puzzles. We see Dog and Pug solving all Granny's puzzles, just in time.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep73
programme.desc: Monty Rides Again - Monty is nervous about trying skateboarding and begins wondering why some people just seem to have courage and others don't.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep313
programme.desc: Ay Fidelity / Cut the Chisme - When Bobby and Par are left in charge of Ziggy's shop, they must resist jamming with the shop's musical treasures. // The family tries to stop their notorious chismoso Hector from gossiping all over town but can he stay quiet?

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep314
programme.desc: Sidekickin' Chicken / Silent Fight - After hearing about a contest to find El Falcon's next sidekick, Carl becomes El Pollito and tries to win! Once Carlitos falls asleep, Carl and CJ must conduct all their playing - and fighting - in absolute silence!

programme.title: The Casagrandes S03 Ep315
programme.desc: Kick Some Bot / Salvador Doggy - Sid faces off against Lisa Loud in the Great Lakes City robotics competition! // When faced with a deadline and no inspiration, Frida tries to use Lalo's paintings as her own!

programme.title: The Twisted Timeline of Sammy and Raj S01 Ep113
programme.desc: Diwali Folly / Well Toiled Machine - It's Diwali! The Guptas are super excited but when Sammy's other cousin Jasmine shows up,Raj suddenly finds himself left out.// A Robot Wrestling tournament has hit town. With help from Chacha Neil, Sammy and Raj's Robot will be indestructible,right?

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep411
programme.desc: Granny Awards - Dave is thrilled when he thinks he's nominated for a Grammy, but it's actually an award for aging musicians.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep411
programme.desc: Sick Day - Alvin and Kevin pretend to be sick to miss school and sneak off to the Dagarack Convention.

programme.title: ALVINNN!!! and The Chipmunks S04 Ep412
programme.desc: Crystal Ball Birthday - Annie and Amber offer to plan Brittany's birthday party, pitting her against Jeanette and Eleanor in the process.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S09 Ep190
programme.desc: Lost in Bikini Bottom / Tutor Sauce - SpongeBob tries to take a shortcut to work, but becomes lost along the way. // After failing his drivers test again, Mr. Krabs decides to teach SpongeBob how to drive himself.

programme.title: Kamp Koral: SpongeBob's Under Years S01 Ep117
programme.desc: Camp Crossbones / A Jelly Life - After SpongeBob, Patrick and Sandy are banned from playing pirate outside, they decide to turn their cabin into a pirate ship. // SpongeBob pretends to be a jellyfish for research purposes.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep112
programme.desc: Pearl Wants to Be a Star / Super Sitters - Pearl stars in a guest appearance on The Patrick Show. // Patrick and SpongeBob go back in time to watch Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy when they were new.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep618
programme.desc: Space Jammed / Crown and Dirty - Annoyed by Leni's intrusive babysitting, Lisa accidentally blasts herself and Todd into space. // Lola tries to whip Mom into tip-top pageant condition for a Mother-Daughter pageant.

programme.title: The Loud House S06 Ep624
programme.desc: Day of the Dad / Small Blunder - Lori struggles to make a good impression on Bobby's dad after accidentally pushing him into a puddle. // Desperate to have the best show-and-tell in class, Lily takes Lisa's shrink ray to school.

programme.title: Transformers: EarthSpark S01 Ep104
programme.desc: House Rules - Thrash is impatient with the family rules and convinces Mo to push boundaries. But when a Decepticon needs their help, Mo and Thrash find themselves playing by a far more dangerous set of rules.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show S01 Ep115
programme.desc: The Uncredible Journey / Host-a-Palooza - Tinkle, Ouchie, and Pinkeye must venture back home together after being taken away by mistake. // Patrick gets injured, so his family members take turns hosting the show.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12 Ep258
programme.desc: Boss for a Day / The Goofy Newbie - Mr. Krabs has an accident and leaves SpongeBob in charge of the Krusty Krab. What could go wrong? // Patrick takes a job at the Goofy Goober when he finds out the employees get free ice cream.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 Ep222
programme.desc: Teacher's Pets - Mr. Krabs and Plankton have to take boating school classes. Thankfully, SpongeBob's there to show them the ropes!

programme.title: Monster High S01 Ep109
programme.desc: What's Up Watzie? / So Familiar - Frankie doesn't want Watzie to leave for dragon migration, so they amp up the fun to try to convince him to stay. // Draculaura must discover her familiar to open a Witchcraft Codex and hone her powers.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep108
programme.desc: Flee Market - Bobby struggles to give up control of the mercado during his pizza-versary date with Lori.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Slink or Swim / The Big Chill - When Bobby finds out Carl can't swim, he offers to show him the ways of the waves! // After begging Abuelo for some A/C, the cousins decide to earn some cash at the neighborhood fair.

programme.title: The Casagrandes S01 Ep115

programme.title: Pelopor Dokumentari (Rpt)
programme.desc: Penerbit-penerbit dokumentari tanah air telah berkumpul di Langkawi, Kedah untuk menghadiri sesi belajar sambil berkongsi idea sesama mereka. Festival 'Walk The Doc' kali kedua di Malaysia ini telah dianjurkan dengan hasrat untuk menggalakkan generasi penerbit muda yang hadir lebih kreatif dalam berkarya. Sesi mengolah idea kepada imej ini melihat kehadiran yang amat menggalakkan. Ramai yang mengulang hadir untuk menerima bimbingan pakar industri dari stesen-stesen televisyen yang disegani termasuk NHK, Jepun dan KBS, Korea Selatan, antaranya. Semoga idea yang dikaryakan terus kreatif dan inovatif, berinspirasikan pengalaman dan semangat masing-masing.

programme.title: First Weapons - Returning Boomerang Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - In South Australia, host Phil Breslin, weapon maker Moogy Sumner and our team of experts unpack the science of Australia's most iconic and scientifically complex weapon - the Returning Boomerang.

programme.title: Q+A Ep30
programme.desc: Sr. 16 - Tackling Australia's energy crisis. Our cities are at risk of rolling blackouts this summer and the regulator is warning of a decade of power outages to come. The panel discuss clean energy and the transition to renewables.

programme.title: Foreign Correspondent - Barbados: Who Should Pay? Ep20
programme.desc: Barbados was the first British slave society in the Caribbean. Now, two years after becoming a republic, there is a growing demand for institutions and the descendants of slave owners to make amends for the sins of the past.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing Ep167
programme.desc: The daily destination for #auspol addicts. Greg Jennett comes to you from Parliament House with the latest news in politics and national affairs, plus interviews with key players on the issues and events making headlines.

programme.title: ABC News with Joe O'Brien Ep187
programme.desc: Joe O'Brien brings you a comprehensive summary of the day's events, with the latest breaking news, in depth coverage of the top stories, live crosses, interviews and explainers to bring you up to speed on what's going on.

programme.title: The Drum Ep172
programme.desc: Conversations on the issues you care about. The Drum makes an impact in people's daily lives, encouraging thoughtful, challenging debate with a diverse panel led by Ellen Fanning, Dan Bourchier, Julia Baird and John Barron.

programme.title: ABC National News Ep187

programme.title: UFC 293: Adesanya vs. Strickland
programme.desc: Main Event - Back to fight down under for the first time since 2019, UFC middleweight champion Israel Adesanya will pack Quodos Bank Arena in Sydney, Australia, when he defends his crown against hungry challenger Sean Strickland in the main event of UFC 293. After regaining his title with a satisfying knockout of Alex Pereira in April, New Zealands Adesanya now sets his sights on Strickland, who has won eight of his last ten bouts on the way to the biggest fight of his career. Plus, the pride of Western Australia returns, as heavyweight knockout artist Tai Tuivasa collides with Alexander Volkov.

programme.title: UFC Unleashed Ep1801
programme.desc: British Invasion - Its a British invasion of the world-famous Octagon as the top stars from across the pond show off their incredible skills on UFC Unleashed. Featuring Tom Aspinall, Meatball Molly McCann, and Paddy The Baddy Pimblett.

programme.title: UFC Fight Flashback EpUFCFightFlashback1005UsmanvsEdwards2
programme.desc: UFC 278 was headlined by a rematch between long reigning middleweight king Kamaru The Nigerian Nightmare Usman and UFC vet Leon Rocky Edwards. See their fight like never before with enhanced replays and angles, new footage, and exclusive audio.

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep13
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep14
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep3
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: UFC Ultimate Knockouts
programme.desc: Black History Month Incredible Knockouts - UFC Ultimate Knockouts brings you some of the most devastating finishes ever seen inside the Octagon. From one-punch knockouts to highlight reel kicks, youll see the UFCs biggest names in their most memorable performance.
